article_title: Poland Pledges to Save Coal Mines Despite Pulling Latest Rescue Plan
article_text:
WARSAW--The Polish government said on Thursday it would come up with a new plan to save some of its coal mines but would take longer than previously thought after the European Commission questioned an existing rescue plan.

The European Union’s executive arm said it would likely reject the plan, under which state-controlled companies were to pool...

twitter.description: The Polish government said it would devise a new plan to save some of its coal mines but would take longer than previously thought after the European Commission questioned an existing rescue plan.
